name: cestbleu
description: Minimal set of basic CSS controls

scripts.build: npm run copy:img && node-sass src/sass/cestbleu.sass dist/css/cestbleu.css
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.watch: npm run build && node-sass --watch src/sass/cestbleu.sass dist/css/cestbleu.css
